title: Analysis of Secondary Algebra Learning Errors and Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational algebraic concepts at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: A process for prospective science teachers to analyze algebraic learning errors in secondary education settings and derive strategies for improving instructional approaches

learning_goals: Classify five major error types occurring in secondary algebra
Apply tools to evaluate the correlation between learning errors and teacher awareness
Design personalized error correction strategies according to assessment-driven instructional methods
A formative assessment feedback system utilizing digital LMS resources can be established
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
